mapper.select: select * from CHAT_ROOMS where ROOM_INFO = #{user_id} or USER_ID = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into CHAT_ROOMS(ROOM_TITLE, ROOM_INFO, USER_ID, CREATED_AT, ROOM_LIMITS, ROOM_STATUS) values(#{user_id}'님과'#{room_info}'님의 채팅방', #{room_info}, #{user_id}, SYSDATE, 2, 'GOOD')
mapper.select: select * from CHATTINGS where ROOM_IDX = #{room_idx} order by room_idx asc
mapper.insert: insert into CHATTINGS(ROOM_IDX, CHATTER, CHATTING, EMOTICON,CHAT_FILE, CHATTED_AT) values(#{room_idx}, #{chatter}, #{chatting} NULL , #{emoticon} NULL , #{chat_file} NULL ,SYSDATE)
